xwikidoc.content:
captcha.recaptcha=reCAPTCHA
XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_siteKey=Site Key XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_siteKey_hint=Public key representing your site, give by your users to Google in exchange for a token. Get it from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin, using your Google account. XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_secretKey=Secret Key XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_secretKey_hint=Secret key used by the reCAPTCHA extension to validate with Google a token received from one of your users. Get it from https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin, using your Google account. XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_theme=Theme XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_theme_hint=The color theme of the widget. XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_theme_light=Light XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_theme_dark=Dark XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_size=Size XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_size_hint=The size of the widget. XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_size_normal=Normal XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_size_compact=Compact XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_tabindex=Tab Index XWiki.Captcha.reCAPTCHA.ConfigurationClass_tabindex_hint=The tabindex of the widget and challenge. If other elements in your page use tabindex, it should be set to make user navigation easier.
